website_summaries.verdict: With several mounting options, this t-bar row platform helps maximize your work options in small spaces.
pros: Easy to attach to rack, bench, floor, or wall
Comes with 2 tightening knobs for bar and rear mount

customer_reviews.title: Get It; Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure how I was going to mount this thing in my garage but took the plunge anyway. I didn't have a lot of options given my space restrictions but I came up with a nice fix (I've attached 2-photos for those with the same dilemma. I am very pleased how it all worked out and did my first workout with landmines today. Great addition to your workout routine!
customer_reviews.author: NavyVeteran20

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for buck!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first because of the price compared to all the others on Amazon. I took the leap and have no regrets! This is as strong and sturdy as the ones I've used at past gyms. I don't know why you would spend more for the same piece of equipment just to have a brand name. A+. I have put up to four 45lb plates on it with no problem. Also purchased the monkey tbar handle on Amazon to go along with it. Here is to a swole back!!
customer_reviews.author: LimFu

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Well made, as advertised, great value!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the absolute best pieces of equipment I've added to my tiny one-car garage gym. Clamped it onto the bottom of my plate tree in minutes. Swivel action is smooth and the base stays immobile. I don't tighten the screw to clamp the barbell into the cup, to protect my black oxide Rogue bar, and it stays put nicely. High quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: With some modifications, it's perfect for the Rogue R-3
customer_reviews.text: I've posted photographs of how I made some modifications to attach this to a Rogue R-3. Compared to Rogue's landmine's $90 price tag, this thing is great at $30. About a month of use and no issues yet. Good range of motion, smooth, and nothing appears to come loose or bent under pressure. If this is helpful, click "helpful" below. Cheers.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: No problems, functional piece of equipment adds a bunch ...
customer_reviews.text: No problems, functional piece of equipment adds a bunch of workout options (try lumberjack squats + press), fits on my rack (Fitness Reality 810 XLT)
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Extremely high quality.
customer_reviews.text: Ok call me crazy but when I bought this I expected it to be cheap, like really chip, I was going to wing it and make the best of it. Boy was I wrong! This piece of equipment is heavy and very high quality. The picture I posted is so you can see the size next to a keyboard
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Great little device
customer_reviews.text: Great little device. I looked into trying to make my own, but after finding this for a great price I couldn't pass it up. Its so worth the $30 over trying to make your own, or getting a more expensive one. I don't have a good place to attach it, so I took the screw clamp off and just place it against a flat wall. I have no issues with it moving around. I would highly recommended this to anyone interested.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Love this device
customer_reviews.text: Love this device. I wanted something so that I could keep my bar in place and this worked exactly as expected. Great swivel and very fluid movement. This device also allows one to mount it directly to the cement wall or to a stud. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kahn

customer_reviews.title: STOP! looking and buy this one
customer_reviews.text: STOP! looking and buy this one. I was skeptical but after reading the reviews I decided to give this a try. I'm glad I did because all others you pretty much had to set up every time you had to use it with plates... this one you just attached it to something else (my plate stand on my case) and is there when ever you need it. Amazon pictures do no justice for the quality of the platform. This is well built, heavy metal and smooth... handles 4-45lbs plates with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jmag

customer_reviews.title: Power Up!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed? Couldn't be. And here is why. 1)Product is priced adequately for what it is, metal. 2) Build seems strong and durable. 3)Flexibility for large gym set up and small space/ apartment lifestyle. I would however make one strong recommendation to the manufacturer, and that is to have a weighted base. I get that this is designed as an attachment but this product could benefit from a heavy base plate should you work out like I do-no power rack. As you can see from my photo, you will have to find a way to secure it from moving around and shifting. Don't hurt yourself, make sure you secure your backing
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little addition to my bench press rack
customer_reviews.text: I have a 7ft standard bar that slots into the 1" standard hole. I've found that this little mini landmine has a pretty good range of motion and stays put if fastened down to the rack. My order also came with the V attachment, which I've found to be good quality and value. The bar + landmine + V attachment is an easy way to imitate a T-bar row platform machine and hit your upper back in a significant way.
customer_reviews.author: Walking Guru

customer_reviews.title: Fits 2"x2" or 3"x3" power racks
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to install onto my power rack. The hinges are high quality and provide zero squeak or any annoying noise. It is basically exactly what you would expect it to be. I believe this model design is not a unique one but a common one mass produced in China and rebranded. However in this case it is alright because this was the cheapest on the market thus far from my research. I think this landmine attachment is a no brainer if you're already looking for one.
customer_reviews.author: Mephesto

customer_reviews.title: so close to being great
customer_reviews.text: Its great except for a pretty big defect. The back face of it has a big bump so it doesnt sit flush agaisnt a wall. You would think they would pay attention to the parts that serve major functions.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for landmine exercises and it works as advertised. Attached to my cage pretty easily. I have an olympic barbell in mine, although there is a slot for a standard bar. I keep the Olympic bar in there with a bungee on the top of the bard attached to my cage to keep if from falling .
customer_reviews.author: book reader

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for at home gym
customer_reviews.text: These will seriously enhance your home gym. I've used them about a year now and they're holding up great. They fit perfectly, and have added more function to my rack and barbell.
customer_reviews.author: Uchiha Itachi

customer_reviews.title: or a rack (in that preferential order) this thing is super solid. The only knock on it
customer_reviews.text: As long as you affix it to the floor, wall, or a rack (in that preferential order) this thing is super solid. The only knock on it, if you could all it that, is that if you ONLY mount to a wall, you're going to want to use a stout lag bolt into a stud, because it only allows for really one screw into a wall. Mounting to the floor gives you 3 screw holes. Something to think about.
customer_reviews.author: P. Scoles

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of equip., But....
customer_reviews.text: I love this Row Platform but unfortunately I am unable to use it. Description says it will fit 2" or 2.5" square tubing so I purchased it because my BMI has 2 3/8" tubing. Maximum opening on the unit is 2 1/4". Beautiful piece of equipment and definitely well made but I am unable to use and am returning it. I would be interested in know if anyone received one of these that had a 2.5" opening. Thanks, Vallejojoe
customer_reviews.author: Vallejojoe

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This platform has some weight on it and it attaches to my squat rack perfectly it’s pretty sturdy and it can hold my standard bar pretty well when I have it attached to this it gives my workouts a little more variety and for the price I’m not complaining
customer_reviews.author: Josh P

customer_reviews.title: Solid. Expanded my weight regime repertoire
customer_reviews.text: This is extremely solid and sturdy. It can be used for so much more than TBar Rows. I can use it for those as well as Landmine Presses, TBar Squats, and more. I don't know if those are the right names,but it's what I call them. It expands what I can do with a barbell and weights for not a while lot of money. I installed it at the base of my power cage and didn't need to bolt or screw it in. The swivel works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Steve L.

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I began doing landmine exercises and was looking for a device that would secure the barbell to my power cage, and this piece of equipment fit the bill perfectly. It is well and thoughtfully designed, for either an Olympic or a standard bar, securing one end of the bar in the device. It is very well made and the swivel feature allows it to be used in a wide variety of exercises. A great product!
customer_reviews.author: WallyWorld

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This unit is made in China but it seems to be good enough quality with wultiple mounting options.
customer_reviews.author: Chad McDermott

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect fitment info
customer_reviews.text: The item looked like it would do the intended job and do it well... However in the item description it says it can fit a 2.5" bar to anchor to. It sadly can not it can definitely fit a 2.2" maybe a 2.3" but definitely not a 2.4" or 2.5" bar. Whoever did the measurements took the measurements from outside of the steel lips that would anchor the unit in place, so clearly you can't fit the metal beam that supposed to go in between the two.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works really good!
customer_reviews.text: It does it’s job, I work shoulders and back with this product. I hooked it up to my existing bench and it works great! No issues at all with it. If I had to say anything bad, it feels flimsy... BUT I row (4) 45’s with it and not one problem came to light. Well worth it, Gym’s are still closed so this item was a must and needed.
customer_reviews.author: DWW

customer_reviews.title: This landmine is great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This landmine is great for the price. Unfortunately, my squat stands are to large for this to secure to, but I just shove this against a wall and I find that works well enough for me. There are so many variations of exercises that this allows you to do with a barbell. I was actually looking into buying dumbbells to supplement my barbell training, but I'm able to do fly's, lateral raises, single arm rows, triceps extensions and numerous other exercises that I don't feel the need to purchase a set of dumbbells. This ended up saving me hundreds of dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit 2 1/2 racking as described
customer_reviews.text: Despite being described as fitting racks up to 2 1/2" this is just a bit too small to fit our rack. Ordered a replacement in case the first was bent slightly but neither fits. Very disappointed. Build quality seems excellent, so if you have a smaller rack it will probably work well.
customer_reviews.author: N. J. Steere

customer_reviews.title: Great for T-bar rows and many other exercises.
customer_reviews.text: I got this so I could finally do one of my favorite exercises, the T-bar row. I had been doing dumbbell rows, but I never really liked them since you usually do one side at a time. As for barbell bent over rows, they always felt awkward to me since I have long legs and poor flexibility. This product fit under my equipment that was a 2x2 in. frame. It was easy to attach and the bar just fit right in. you can secure it with the locking screw. Not much more to say, it does what it is supposed to and rotates very easy. Great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: JamesH

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t aske for a better product! I also bought a lat blaster bar ...
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t aske for a better product! I also bought a lat blaster bar for about $65 and I haven’t looked back! This helps with my back workouts (along with pull-ups), so I can save money and not have to worry about a gym membership! I attached it to the leg on my treadmill.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get but we’ll made
customer_reviews.text: Nothing but issues trying to get this. I ordered the first one and it eventually it said the delivery was “lost.” So I was refunded by Amazon and I ordered another one that was delivered to the wrong location. The items itself is solid and works well. No real mouthing hardware if you want to mount it to the wall is my one knock.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great SOLID landmine base.
customer_reviews.text: I made a makeshift landmine base out of some 2x4s and stuff and broke down to buy this and give it a shot and it is WAY better. This is a SOLID landmine base. All edges are welded together and is great. I attached this to bottom of my squat rack with no issues. The place you put the bar spins 360 degrees easily and it also moves up and down with not issues. This is easily worth the $30ish it costs.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this. I mounted it to my deadlift platform that I built I had to use washers because the holes are so big but this thing works and is super sturdy and moves in all directions. Get price great color 10/10 would buy again and recommend to anyone looking.
customer_reviews.author: Desirae

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome awesome device. I bolted nice down and it’s so much better than the posts they are selling. I use a titan fitness landmine stand and when I try to sit a heavy load down the post would always pop out. This solves that problem and I now love landmine exercises. So good. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: crosby23

customer_reviews.title: A good land mine.
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical when I purchased. I have a 2” x 2” rack, so I was skeptical how I would fit the attachment. Turns out the device has such a large range of motion that I was able to use a side bar to attach (photo included). I’ve used it for t bar rows up to 4 x 45 lbs, and the device Showed no signs of problems.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good value, great piece of equipment. Fits 2x2 racks, but can be bolted to the ground. My rack is 2x3, so it does not fit, unfortunately, but will be upgrading the squat rack before long anyway. Fits on my plate rack, so no problems. Had it fairly weighted up for rows and it did not budge the plate rack one bit. Really pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Lande

customer_reviews.title: T-Bar Row for the working man
customer_reviews.text: I hate spending money on a gym where I have to wait to use a machine. Luckily, we moved into a home with a garage which was large enough to put some equipment in. The only thing we needed was a T-Bar Row so we can get that back pumped up nicely. This was a perfectly affordable solution and it gets the job done with great results. I recommend also buying a T-Bar handle as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy unless your racks 2” or less
customer_reviews.text: They claim it will fit a 2 1/2”rack but that’s not true. My rack is 2 3/8” and I can’t get it on. I’m going to try to find a place to attach it elsewhere in my gym. The box it came in looked like it got ran over, and it was half open, but the thick steel was relatively unscathed save for a few cosmetic scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Scruffy

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and we'll made.
customer_reviews.text: I was planning on making one of these and somehow or another it shows up in my recommendations. I couldn't beat the price point. It was going to cost me double in material let alone the time to make it. It works great and it can even accommodate the 1" bars as well as the olympic.
customer_reviews.author: George Powitz

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit 2.5” frame
customer_reviews.text: From the web site: "EASY TO INSTALL: Can be attached to a 2" or 2.5" rack/bench, mount to floor or wall. Come with two tightening knobs for Olympic bar and rear mount " False!!! It will not fit a frame that is 2.5” wide, it’s spacing is only 2.25”, will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Camell

customer_reviews.title: Decent Landmine, but Fitment is Poor
customer_reviews.text: The functionality of the landmine is great. My biggest issue is that it does not fit 2.5” racks as stated. It looks as if it was designed to fit, but the manufacturing process showed a flaw when cutting and bending the inside tabs. I took a cutting wheel to it and cut the inside tabs off, and used a bolt to secure it to my rack.
customer_reviews.author: Zenzo Tazawa

customer_reviews.title: The movement is smooth and easy to get the barbell in and out
customer_reviews.text: It works well. The movement is smooth and easy to get the barbell in and out. Due to space limitations, it made more sense to mount it to my weight tree instead of the power cage. It lifts the weight tree slightly causing a slight wobble, but when I put the weight back on the tree, the wobble stopped. So, I'd this device is not as ideal as one purpose built for your particular power cage (and when I buy a Rogue or Force USA cage, I'll probably get their branded landmine), but for now this thing works great and the price is good.
customer_reviews.author: каска

customer_reviews.title: Versatile but the bar can slide out
customer_reviews.text: Great stand, very sturdy. My only complaint is that when I put a bar in the bar does slide out. The fastener doesn’t prevent the bar from sliding out when doing angled barbell squats. But other than that, awesome product. Great home gym addition.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, measurements slightly off
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. Would have given 5 stars but it says it fits 2-2.5" frames and it did not fit on my 2.5". I had to bend it a little to make it work. Absolutely love the range of motion, I don't bother using the tension screw when I put my Olympic bar in it, the cup is deep enough as it is. Was pleasantly surprised at how sturdy and well made it is. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Ted and Katie

customer_reviews.title: Missing Bolt and Poor Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: Bolt missing like other reviews, emailed customer service and 3 days later no response and cant find a number to call. Quality control needs to be implemented better. The device is useless now and sitting there begging for a bolt to be used. Its like buying a car with 3 tires and missing 4th tire.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ing

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged already!
customer_reviews.text: This came and looks promising but right out of the package it’s heavily scratched and the powder coating is scraped off. Kind of a bummer! Would love if the product arrived not damaged!
customer_reviews.author: Nico

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, great value - highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I've seen some attachment options for well over $100 so I was a little hesitant about this. So glad I took the chance as this was not only a great value, but offers several options for install/setup depending on your equipment and layout. This has been working well in a community gym for a couple months now . Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Happy with product
customer_reviews.text: Bolted to a homemade "box" works fantastic. Very durable. For Yes4All made me nervous at first, but, it's surprisingly good quality for the money. I have purchased from them in the past and they have a good record.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Amyx

customer_reviews.title: Best home or garage gym investment
customer_reviews.text: This is solid, has great range of motion -- more than you'd ever need. I fixed it to the floor and garage steps and works great. A simple piece of equipment that offers a range of exercises that feel good to do. This sounds like BS but it's not -- the best $30 or so bucks you'll spend in any home gym.
customer_reviews.author: Alistair

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Make sure this is anchored to the ground, wall or equipment to restrain. The forces applied to this little piece of equipment are more than you'd think and will move or disconnect if not secured properly, causing injury or damage. Once secured properly, works perfectly as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Mike P.

customer_reviews.title: Works great and good on budget. Added lock for 1" bar would've been great
customer_reviews.text: Great for doing barbell t-bar rows and works great. An added lock for a 1" standard barbell would have been better just to keep it in place and adds more stability
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great edition to my home gym equipment! Came quick and packaged great. Look forward to using it this week!
customer_reviews.author: Renzo916

customer_reviews.title: It would have been great if it fit.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited for this product as you can attach it directly to your cage or squat rack and you don’t have to drill holes in your floor or wall. Well, the description is not accurate. It states that it will fit over a cage that has 2” to 2.5” tubing. It will not fit over anything more than 2”. I measured my cage and it is 2.25” and this product will not fit. I returned it to amazon with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Todd K O'Neal

customer_reviews.title: Completes your gym
customer_reviews.text: Bolted this platform to my concrete floor and boom...this bad boy is ready to pump some iron. I love the range of motion and pivot of the platform. I'd give this 10 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Juice

customer_reviews.title: No customer service
customer_reviews.text: Don’t try to return items through this vendor, they don’t reply to return request! The item however is as described.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I've never done landmines before. I'm gad I choose this product. I put mine under the 2" steel tubing of my hip-sled. I think it had an 1/8 inch of play left. It works perfectly. Swivels 360. It is solid. My 2" Olympic bar ( X mark Lumberjack) fits perfectly! I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit inside 2.5" rack
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. The only downside was it did not fit inside my 2.5" rack. A little love from my grinder on the inside brackets made it fit and securely. The amount I shaved off did not effect usability at all. I would easily buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rock solid, great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting less for the money. Rock solid, swivel is smooth in both directions. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Iz

customer_reviews.title: does NOT fit 2.3" racks
customer_reviews.text: the description of this says it fits 2"/2.3" and that is absolutely not true. I spent some time looking for a product that fits my cage and the false advertising of this product now means I have to return it. Nevermind the fact that shipping took much longer than first expected. I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: todd

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: I have a small workout area and by attaching this to my power cage I am able to add a few more exercises to my routine. Goblet squats (in place of a dumbbell) and Penley (sp) rows.
customer_reviews.author: James G.

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as intended
customer_reviews.text: I inserted a standard barbell and the product worked incredibly well. It feels sturdy and allows for total range of motion. You have several anchoring options - I'm currently using a cinder block from the yard with no issues. Overall, this is an incredible value for the price. I'm glad I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AtomicP

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I mounted mine to a concrete floor with tap cons and it works great. Great range of motion and easy to use. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for viking shoulder press conversion
customer_reviews.text: I use this mainly to attach to my barbell and hold the one end onto the power rack, converting it to a viking shoulder press exercise. It works really great for this.
customer_reviews.author: TODD G LINDBERG

customer_reviews.title: Another great tool to add to your home gym!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, doesn't make noise, fits barbell well and doesn't slip. Good range of motion and it's smooth. Other things I suggest for your home gym: power rack, resistance bands (heavy duty ones, I have 420lbs of them), a hexbar (trap bar), cable pulley system, and dumbbell hooks (like power hooks)
customer_reviews.author: Carson

customer_reviews.title: Works Great! just as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: It can mount easily and anywhere, just about. I love using it as it can be used for many different exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it's perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. Please note, you need to bolt it to the floor, or attach to something else that's bolted to the floor. I tried just hooking it to my bench, but it just lifted my bench up, and my bench is really heavy - commercial weight steel. Attached to my squat rack, which is bolted to the floor, it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: DeGriffe

customer_reviews.title: Great for T bar rows
customer_reviews.text: For your home gym, there are workarounds for doing a T-bar row, but this is the legit way. Slides onto your Olympic bar so you can attach any kind of handle you want and perform the exercise. Solid and sturdy, with a chain and connector.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bratman

customer_reviews.title: Landmine add-on
customer_reviews.text: Works well, I had to find a different place to "install" as my rack is just a bit too large to mount, I had to use my dumbbell rack but it works just the same. It would have been nice if it was a little wider for the mounting, a bit more universal but I made it work. Measure your install location and ensure it'll fit.
customer_reviews.author: Bach3kids

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I got this and I almost cut the one end off to put it on my boxing bag rack, good thing I waited to get my power rack. Fits perfect on the power rack and I can move it as I need, Not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and functions great. I would recommend some locktite on the screw where it swivels. Comes undone and gets really looks, really fast.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: solid enough unit but...
customer_reviews.text: Although it is advertised to fit 2.5" standard frame rails, mine did not fit (significantly too small). No way to modify to allow to fit to my equipment. Otherwise looks like a fine product, but dont buy assuming it will fit 2.5" rails.
customer_reviews.author: odex

customer_reviews.title: Great and smart investment !!!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and many ways how to train with the landmine tool from lower to upper , even some mobility exercises . Highly recommended .
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Great product and price, be sure to measure what you’re using it on to ensure it will fit in the gap.
customer_reviews.author: B-Dub

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to have!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t quite fit on my rogue rack since the rack isn’t close to the ground so we ended up screwing it in to the wall. Works great! Very sturdy and moves without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Great service.
customer_reviews.text: This was one of those orders people make jokes about....it seemed the product arrived before I even finished ordering. I ordered the morning of 1 April and it arrived 2 Apr. Awesome. Product itself is great. Land mine is beefy and well constructed. I attached it to the bottom of my weight tree and it works great. Handle is strong and beefy too. It doesn’t feel light or fragile.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for rows etc., attached to my dumbbell rack with no issues. Note the attachment piece may not be big enough to attach to some squat racks.
customer_reviews.author: Sci-Fi_Fan_IV

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Normally i do not review items but I Highly recommend this product ! This has taken my At-home-gym to another level . Very strong metal and the prices was affordable! It comes assemble you just have to find the best place to store it.
customer_reviews.author: JiggaWhaaa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Product exactly as advertised Thank you to other reviewers for sharing ideas how to mount it
customer_reviews.author: Moxie

customer_reviews.title: Love it so much
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this piece. It fits nicely on squat bar and easy to use. Has a insert for smaller bars too. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Works great and solid construction
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these for home gyms in different locations, one where I use an Olympic bar and the other where I use a narrow bar. Both work great. I've owned one for two years and this evening I completed a back workout that included T-rows with this device. I'm always pleased that I have it.
customer_reviews.author: MPC

customer_reviews.title: A nice addition to my home gym
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected! Nice product. Very pleased with how easy it was to set up on my power rack and it’s perfect to leave in place.
customer_reviews.author: S. Loria

customer_reviews.title: Good add for a home gym
customer_reviews.text: I added this during C-19 “stay-in-home” order. Versatile, sturdy and very easy to set up. Happy I bought it, since my gym is still closed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Javier Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to home gym!
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to any home gym! Mounted right up to the 2x2 base on my power rack. This really adds to the amount of workouts you can do and takes up virtually no space.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy M.

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price on this thing.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my home gym and attached it to my dumbbell rack. This thing was so easy to install and it works exactly as advertised. It added a nice change up to my workouts. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Quality t-bar for 2 inch and 1 inch bars
customer_reviews.text: Great design and easy to put on and take off 2 inch bar. Makes bent row back exercises a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Juice

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces.
customer_reviews.text: I would have loved this if it came with all the pieces! Absolutely ridiculous to ship out product that is broken.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Young

customer_reviews.title: I hope you have a kick ass hammer drill for the floor install.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and the Titan Parallel Handle and I could not be more pleased. Drilling the patio concrete slab to fit the 1/4" lag screws and masonary lag shields was quite a bit of work, but well worth the effort. Now I can train back,legs,chest and shoulders in a different plane of resistance than barbells and dumbells.
customer_reviews.author: sean nunnink

customer_reviews.title: Product is ok
customer_reviews.text: Works well except for when the Knob broke. Customer service doesn't respond.
customer_reviews.author: Cori

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great for T-Bar rows. If you get 2, it's also great for chain-loaded bench press. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: it's OK for light use
customer_reviews.text: not as sturdy as commercial gym units and feels a little flimsy. But for the price point they deliver.. Just know that you can't get too tough with these as they're on the economy end.
customer_reviews.author: winkytiki

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition
customer_reviews.text: Using this bad boi on my fitness reality 810xlt rack. Easy install works fantastic and a must have for the price
customer_reviews.author: Jerry R.

customer_reviews.title: Broken clip almost caused injury
customer_reviews.text: I would not buy this unless they strengthen the carabiner clip. I was lifting 65 lbs doing row and it completely snapped and the weight came crashing down and missed my son by inches. Not happy at all about that.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh ODonnell

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: After reading some reviews, I had some trepidation, but no problems. Mine came fully assembled; it was easy to mount, and it does the job. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Carrison

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as a gift for a train partner ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a training partner of mine, who also has a garage gym. I have 2 similar landmine devices in my gym from another company. These things are so versatile and the price can't be beat...it's a must have for a home gym!! Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald McDermott

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I've only been using it for 1 month ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction. So far so good. I've only been using it for 1 month and so far everything is great! I am happy with my purchase i will update my review in a year. I will give it 5 stars if i make it to 1 year without any issues. I want this product to last a lifetime to be worth it. I use it in my home gym so I expected to last!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got it!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived yesterday, it looked really heavy duty and well built. Looking forward to using it, I will keep you updated.
customer_reviews.author: Gonz

customer_reviews.title: Measurements are off.
customer_reviews.text: Top quality yet this piece of equipment states in the description that it will fit on a 2.5 inch wide tubing. It will not connect to my Powertec rack or the Yukon Hip Sled. Both of those measure are 2.5 inches. So I connected it to my dumbbell rack which is 2 inches in width.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisW

customer_reviews.title: work like a magic
customer_reviews.text: I did not really know this kind of thing exist, but guess it should. So I searched and bought this one, it works like a magic. Exactly what I want. I used to use other things to put in corner of wall but always got broke at some time point.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I give this product a five star rating because I have no problems with it and it came on time and it does exactly what I expected it to do I definitely recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Efrain roman

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: It was very wobbly and didn’t seem to be put together with the correct hardware. It was so rickety it wasn’t usable, unfortunately. I did take it apart and a add an additional washer to keep it from being so bad I couldn’t use it. It is still noisy and rattles more than it should but at least it’s usable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well built.
customer_reviews.text: This is very well built. I mounted mine with anchor bolts in my home gym. It used 4 to five days a week by my wife and I.
customer_reviews.author: RogueBear

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: works for both standard and olympic bars. Great home gym addition!
customer_reviews.author: booostin

customer_reviews.title: Economical & Solid - so far
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I have not attaching it to anything. I have only braced it against wall, or if outdoors, a cinder block, or immovable object. I like that it can be used for both standard and Olympic bars. I know there are better, more solid & expensive ones out there, but if you need to budget this is great & should last if you take care of it.
customer_reviews.author: Iglanta

product_meta.title: Yes4All Deluxe T-Bar Row Platform – Full 360° Swivel & Easy to Install – Fits 1” Standard and 2” Olympic Bars - Great for Home Gym
feature_bullets: COMPACT FOR HOME GYM – Multiuse Design Gives You Large Variety of Workout Options in Tight Spaces; Benefits of a Weight Room in Your Living Room
Universal designed Viking landmine handle: Multigrip with wide space handles, Fit 2" Olympic barbell, solid steel construction, Safety lock knob.
Gauge steel construction T-bar row platform axle pivot point & dual bronze oil-lite bushings for more durability with full 360 degree rotating features.
Allows multiple workouts: haft kneeling shoulder press, lateral lunge, landmine press, overhead squat,…to target muscle gains chest, back, shoulder, tricep.

FIT 2” OLYMPIC BARBELL: Designed with 7” long tube, Yes4All Landmine Attachment is compatible with 2” Olympic barbell. Simply slide your barbell over the Handle & then tighten the knob for a secure workout
Easy to install: can be attached to 2"/2.3" Power rack, mounted to floor or wall. Come with lock knob to fit the rack and Barbell.
1-YEAR WAR – PLACE YOUR ORDER NOW: Our Yes4All Viking Press Landmine Handle Attachment comes with 30-day return and 1-year war.
